description: ff. 66. 19th cen. Fihrist-i kutub-i Shaykh-i ajall-i awhad-i marḥūm Shaykh Aḥmad Aḥsāʼī, no. 423; Fihris makhṭūtāt al-Maktabah al-Gharbīyah bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Kabīr bi-Ṣanʻāʼ, no. 383/1; Hamadān p. 1499; Nashr. VII, 570; Yazd III, no. 1001; 1948/2. The work was completed on 29 Sha ʻb. 1267H. Incip.: ... الحمد لله رب العالمىن ... ىقول العبد الاثىم کرىم بن ابراهىم
author: Kirmānī, Muḥammad Karīm Khān, -1871 or 1872
creator: Kirmānī, Muḥammad Karīm Khān, -1871 or 1872
subject: Shaykhī.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
